column4: can someone type me in private message i would like toa ask something about my ubuntu desktop
is it software or hardware problem because my system monitor says that im running on 99-100% of CPU and im not doing anythin special at all
i'd check that with "uptime" or "top" since the system monitor /itself/ is known to drive up cpu usage
yes, the gnome gui for system monitor uses a ton of cpu so anytime you look at it, it shows the cpu being in high usage
